a.title: Go to Detroit Edison Public School Academy

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

div.p: Our mission is to provide a quality education through shared responsibility in a safe supportive environment for all students to meet the challenges of a global society. We are “Committed to Excellence”, and we work hard to make the site a primary source for timely information for all users, and a main gateway for improved communication between parents, teachers, students and other members of our community.

span.a: ECE Student Survey Link Click Here

em.span: School Closed for DEPSA K8 & ECE

span.span: >> Governor Whitmer has announced a mandatory shutdown for K-12 schools. DEPSA will be closed starting Friday, March 13th, 2020, until further notice. All Staff must report! We will communicate more details as soon as they are available. Thank you for you understanding.
